messages.6: Dosing time for pH lower exceeded
messages.7: Dosing time for pH raise exceeded
messages.title: Message list

cf100.saved: The changes have been sent to your CF Control 100

calibrationinfo.description:
- Unscrew the pH electrode and wipe it dry with a clean cloth.
- Immerse the pH electrode in buffer solution 7.0 and wait until the pH value does not change anymore.
- Calibrate pH 7 type and wait until the pH value has reached approx. 7.00 pH.
- Dry the pH electrode with a paper fleece.
- Immerse the pH electrode in buffer solution 4.0 and wait until the pH value does not change anymore.
- Calibrate pH 4 type and wait until the pH value has reached approx. 4.00 pH.
- The calibration process is complete.
calibrationinfo.title: Calibrating the pH electrode

subscription.message:
In order to change settings on your CF Control 100 you need a subscription.

### %{title}
**%{price} per %{month} months**
Allows you to change values on all your CF Control 100s and calibrate them via the app.
